system.note: Space Marines Only, not easily acquirable. Causes loud flash and incapacitating sound. Those in blast make +0 Toughness Test or become Stunned for 1d10 Rounds. Photo-Visors and Sealed armour provide +20 to test, input filtering or additional visual and sound protection provides immunity.

description.value:
Special: SM Wep, Blast (5)

Note: Space Marines Only, not easily acquirable. Causes loud flash and incapacitating sound. Those in blast make +0 Toughness Test or become Stunned for 1d10 Rounds. Photo-Visors and Sealed armour provide +20 to test, input filtering or additional visual and sound protection provides immunity.
